CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oceanview Condos relative to Crystal Cove Villas?
SRP.A: Oceanview Condos is {above} Crystal Cove Villas in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total rental yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crystal Cove Villas}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total rental yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Oceanview Condos}.

VE.Q: What is Crystal Cove Villas's Rental Yield in 1988?
VE.A: Crystal Cove Villas's rental yield in 1988 is {10.38} %.

VE.Q: What is Willow Creek Estates's Rental Yield in 1982?
VE.A: Willow Creek Estates's rental yield in 1982 is {6.90} %.

VE.Q: What is Crystal Cove Villas's Rental Yield in 1982?
VE.A: Crystal Cove Villas's rental yield in 1982 is {7.66} %.

VE.Q: What are the rental yield of Oceanview Condos, Willow Creek Estates, and Crystal Cove Villas in 1983?
VE.A: Oceanview Condos's rental yield is {4.66} %, Willow Creek Estates's rental yield is {7.20} %, Crystal Cove Villas's rental yield is {7.95} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Rental Yield in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum rental yield is {4.65} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Rental Yield in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum rental yield is {10.47} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Rental Yield level recorded for Crystal Cove Villas?
EVJ.A: Crystal Cove Villas reached approximately {10.38} % in {1988}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Rental Yield level recorded for Crystal Cove Villas?
EVJ.A: Crystal Cove Villas's lowest recorded level is approximately {6.17} % in {1979}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Rental Yield?
SC.A: The average total rental yield is {29.82} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Rental Yield exceed 33.10 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Rental Yield go below 27.54 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Rental Yield fall between 28.80 and 31.83 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Rental Yield in 1981 higher or lower than in 1986?
NC.A: The total rental yield in 1981 was {lower} than in 1986.

NC.Q: Was the total Rental Yield in 1986 higher or lower than in 1987?
NC.A: The total rental yield in 1986 was {higher} than in 1987.

NC.Q: Was the total Rental Yield in 1980 higher or lower than in 1988?
NC.A: The total rental yield in 1980 was {lower} than in 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1984, did the total Rental Yield experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1988?
NC.A: The change in total rental yield between 1980 and 1984 was {larger} than between 1985 and 1988.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Crystal Cove Villas} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Oceanview Condos, Willow Creek Estates, Crystal Cove Villas, Skyline Towers}.
